example.parse: (TOP (FRAG (NP-ADV (ADV+CASE_INDEF_ACC ثالِثاً)) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN المُتَّهَم)) (NP (NOUN_PROP حَبِيب) (DET+NOUN_PROP العادِلِيّ))) (PP (PREP بِ) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN اِيداع) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ُه)) (NAC (-NONE- *ICH*-1))) (NP-DTV (NOUN مُسْتَشْفَى) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL المَجانِين)) (PP-PRP (PREP لِ) (NP (NOUN عَدَم) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG سَلامَة) (NP (NP (NOUN قُوا) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))) (ADJP (TYPO العقليةهو)))))) (NAC-1 (X (NO_FUNC ومعاونية))))))))
